General.Name: Jiangsu Zongyi Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Zongyi Co.,LTD engages in the clean energy, advanced technology, and integrated finance businesses. It constructs and manages photovoltaic power stations in the Czech Republic, Italy, the United States, Germany, Bulgaria, Romania, and China. The company also engages in the research and development, and sale of smart cards and related application technology, system integration, and handheld and self-service terminal equipment; research and development of ultra-low-power digital-analog hybrid hearing aid chips and high-end digital voice processing technology; and provision of digital hearing aid chips and solutions. In addition, it is involved in the equity investment activities. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Nantong, China.

4.Name: Ms. Zhengwei  Gu
4.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board Director & Director
